original.html:
<button>
      <svg>
      <filter id="pedroduarteisalegend">
        <feTurbulence stitchTiles="stitch" numOctaves="4" baseFrequency="0.5" type="fractalNoise"></feTurbulence>
      </filter>
      <rect filter="url(#pedroduarteisalegend)" height="100%" width="100%"></rect>
    </svg>
      Button
</button>
